dtliExcerpt: The Nance is a beautifully crafted play about the costs of hiding, and Nathan Lane gives one of his finest performances as Chauncey Miles, a burlesque comic who specializes in effeminate stereotypes while concealing his own homosexuality.
showScoreExcerpt: The Nance is a beautifully crafted play about the costs of hiding, and Nathan Lane gives one of his finest performances as Chauncey Miles, a burlesque comic who specializes in effeminate stereotypes while concealing his own homosexuality.
